=== ఉబుంటు ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్ జట్టుకు స్వాగతం | Welcome to Andhra Pradesh Local Team ===

<nowiki>[[File:363664462_6638a7ccd5_d.jpg]]</nowiki>

This is the home page for the '''Andhra Pradesh Ubuntu Local Community Team'''.

''The Andhra Pradesh team focuses on distributing, advertising and demonstrating Ubuntu within Andhra Pradesh. Through the development of our projects we focus on the areas of schools, business and home users.''
